item.description:
Let's decide how best to form and to promote this group.

Initially, my Chorus, Sounds of Concord, will sponsor it and provide space, but we might consider moving to another date/time if that is more convenient.

The purpose should be to promote Barbershop Singing and to share tips, techniques, and stuff going on, and to have fun with other members.

Our Chorus typically goes out to dinner after rehearsals, (about 10 P.M.) so for those who are late nighters, that is an option too.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Lee Daum or Dan Costello or Jim Kenealy from Sounds of Concord. We rehearse in this location at 7:30.
item.why: If you are a singer or love to hear good singing you'll love it; we sing four part a cappella harmony. We also do some choreographed moves (nothing too hard), too. If you've not heard this uniquely American Art form then you are in for a treat.

group.name: Boston Area Acapella Barbershop Quartet/Chorus Singing

item.name: The Boston Area Barbershop Quartet Singing April Meeting
